reviewText: I love her and the video is fabulous for anyone, at any level. I've been hooping for awhile but this brought me out of my winter blues. I use this to warm up!
Waste of money, no instructions what so ever, YouTube is better than this useless DVD, save your money!
Everything is explained step by step. Detailed & fun!
One of the best hula hoop learning DVDs. Love her energy and gentle way of teaching.  She helped me learn how to hoop around my shoulders. I want her to make another one!
I love the Hoop Revoultion Core Foundation DVD.  This DVD has different techniques that I can use in my warm ups before hooping, hope to see more DVD's.
